\name{Net.Rating}
\alias{Net.Rating}
\title{Net.Rating}
\usage{
Net.Rating <- (PLAYER_NAME, PLUS_MINUS)
}
\arguments{
\item{PLAYER_NAME}{The name of the player}
\item{PLUS_MINUS}{Players average plus minus stat per game}
}
\description{
Rate a players overall rating when on the floor
}
\examples{
Net.Rating("Lebron James", 13.5)
}
